response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for $100. This price represents a significant savings compared to our standard retail price, while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the product's worth. We're confident it will meet your expectations and provide substantial value to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 100}
